data.message: I am trying to find out about a man claiming to work for Facebook Promotions. His name is Po Andrea and he claims my name was 1 of 5 picked to win $500,000. He said Facebook does a promotion every month. If you want I can send you the messages he sent me. Sure would like an answer. Thank You

replies.message: Hey Rosemarie. Thanks for checking in with us. This campaign is a hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1V2y8Xp. Thanks. -Jordan
How do folks keep falling for this stuff?  SMH
